docs.text:
Welcome to BodoMT


A machine translation engine initially for English to Bodo and Bodo to English.
It has a lot more vision for translation. This project will be number one 
translation engine not only for Bodo language but for all Indian language 
which does not have a technologically rich environtment.


Commands




mkdocs new [dir-name]
 - Create a new project.


mkdocs serve
 - Start the live-reloading docs server.


mkdocs build
 - Build the documentation site.


mkdocs help
 - Print this help message.




Project layout


mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
docs.title: Home
